text: Clifford Glenwood Shull (September 23, 1915 â€“ March 31, 2001) was an American physicist. He won the 1994 Nobel Prize in Physics with Bertram Brickhouse. Shull's awards include the Buckley Prize, which he received from the American Physical Society in 1956, and election to the American Academy of Arts and Sciences (1956) and to the National Academy of Sciences (1975). ==Other websites== * Full-text digital archive of Clifford G. title: Clifford Shull
